export let UserRole=/*#__PURE__*/function(UserRole){UserRole[UserRole["User"]=0]="User";UserRole[UserRole["Admin"]=1]="Admin";UserRole[UserRole["ProjectManager"]=2]="ProjectManager";return UserRole;}({});export let TaskStatus=/*#__PURE__*/function(TaskStatus){TaskStatus[TaskStatus["Pending"]=0]="Pending";TaskStatus[TaskStatus["InProgress"]=1]="InProgress";TaskStatus[TaskStatus["Completed"]=2]="Completed";TaskStatus[TaskStatus["Cancelled"]=3]="Cancelled";return TaskStatus;}({});export let TaskPriority=/*#__PURE__*/function(TaskPriority){TaskPriority[TaskPriority["Low"]=0]="Low";TaskPriority[TaskPriority["Medium"]=1]="Medium";TaskPriority[TaskPriority["High"]=2]="High";TaskPriority[TaskPriority["Critical"]=3]="Critical";return TaskPriority;}({});// Alias para compatibilidad
export const Priority=TaskPriority;export let ProjectStatus=/*#__PURE__*/function(ProjectStatus){ProjectStatus[ProjectStatus["Planning"]=0]="Planning";ProjectStatus[ProjectStatus["InProgress"]=1]="InProgress";ProjectStatus[ProjectStatus["Completed"]=2]="Completed";ProjectStatus[ProjectStatus["Cancelled"]=3]="Cancelled";ProjectStatus[ProjectStatus["OnHold"]=4]="OnHold";return ProjectStatus;}({});
